# thumbnailSize

**Instance Property**

Returns the maximum width and height of the thumbnails in the thumbnail view.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var thumbnailSize: CGSize { get set }
```

```swift
@MainActor var thumbnailSize: NSSize { get set }
```

## Return Value

The maximum width and height of the thumbnails in the thumbnail view.
title: thumbnailSize
